mdRecord.dcterms:title: Complainte tres piteuse de Flamette a son amy Pãphile / Translatee Ditalien en vulgaire Francoys
Complainte tres piteuse de Flamette a son amy Pamphile
Boccaccio, Giovanni, 1313-1375. Fiammetta. French (Middle French)
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Boccaccio, Giovanni, 1313-1375 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Trautz-Bauzonnet. Unidentified armorial bookplate (crest, with tree and crown), probably that of De Fresne; unidentified monogram bookplate "EM" or "ME." Monogram bookplate of SSB, Silvain S. Brunschwig. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 706. [original]
